Both Elovia and Yurasa have three "branches" of Skills that have different focuses.
For example, as of right now, you can choose one of the Skills \is[4], \is[5] and \is[6] for Elovia to "equip".\| This can be done by using the Item \ii[21] outside of battle.
Try and use \ii[21] or \ii[40] now to swap a Skill.
Levelling up will give you access to higher tiers of Skills, each with unique effects.
If a particular area or boss is giving you trouble, it may be worth changing your Skill set.
